description:
GCE Instances should not enable IP Forwarding.

IP Forwarding is a network feature that permits VM intances to forward network traffic between network interfaces and/or networks. Unless specifically required by a use case, and fully backed-up by firewall and routing configuration no VM instance should enable it, as it can contribute to a successfull network attack.
fix: This setting cannot be changed after the instance creation, you must delete it and created a new instance.
